info.name: TMC API (Toyota Manufacturers Club) - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Toyota Manufacturers Club backend system.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Token <your-token>
```

## Response Format
All responses follow this standard format:
```json
{
  "status": "success/error",
  "code": "response_code",
  "message": {
    "en": "English message",
    "id": "Pesan dalam bahasa Indonesia"
  },
  "data": {},
  "meta": {}
}
```

## Version History
- v1.0.0: Initial collection
- v1.1.0: Added missing endpoints and extended functionality

item.name: Events
item.description: Event management endpoints - create, manage, and register for events

request.description: Get list of all upcoming events

response.name: Event List Response

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific event

body.raw:
{
  "title": "New Toyota Workshop",
  "date": "2024-03-15T09:00:00Z",
  "venue": "Surabaya Convention Center",
  "main_image": "1",
  "description": "Workshop manufacturing terbaru",
  "is_free": true,
  "is_registration_close": false,
  "is_list_attendees": true,
  "price": null,
  "billing_deadline": null
}

request.description: Register current user to an event
Get QR code for event attendance (event owner only)
Get events created by current user
Get events where current user is registered
Export event registrants to Excel (Admin only)
Delete event reference by reference ID
Mark attendance by scanning QR code

Set Virtual Account number for company
Remove PIC (Person In Charge) from company
Get detailed survey information with questions

Get specific survey detail for event
Export event survey results to Excel
Get list of all blog posts
